settings.helpText: This field is used only in Contentful and does not impact the Maven app

Heading level for accordion item titles, which depends on where in the article the accordion is.  For example, if the heading of the section containing this accordion is an h2, the accordion item titles should use h3
This field is used only in Contentful and does not impact the Maven app
Slugs are used for course registration data and should never be modified after initial publishing. Course slugs should be treated as completely unmodifiable.
The title or shortened title of the piece of content
This field is used only in Contentful and does not impact the Maven app
The image is used within the homepage dashboard featured block on web only
